commentBody: Yes, let us fixate on slang in a vindictive attempt to undermine supporters of a particular presidential candidate and not focus on the corruption in american politics. Because there is none. Let's rail hard against people we don't agree with and not come to an understanding that corporate interests trump public interests in Washington. Because everything is copacetic, bro. Instead, let us dissect the culture around the word "Plutocracy". An uninformed democracy is no democracy at all. "...of the people, by the people, for the people..."
